CustomField.description: This milestone is overdue - it has not been completed and we're past the date due.
CustomField.formula: AND(ISBLANK( Date_completed__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Date_due__c )), TODAY() > Date_due__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This milestone is overdue - it has not been completed and we're past the date due.
CustomField.label: Is overdue
